content: भट्टः [भट्-तन्] {@--1@} A lord, master (used as a title of respect in addressing princes.). {@--2@} A title used with the names of learned Brāhmaṇas; भट्टगोपालस्य पौत्रः <ls>Māl. 1</ls>; so कुमारिलभट्टः &c. {@--3@} Any learned man or philosopher. {@--4@} A kind of mixed caste, whose occupation is that of bards or panegyrists; क्षत्रियाद्विपकन्यायां भट्टो जातोऽनुवाचकः. {@--5@} A bard, panegyrist.
